page.title: 05FARMING:TATTON FARM:LANGTON
page.content: {TATTON FARM 'HIGHER & LOWER'}IS A{ {DAIRY FARM}WITH APPROXIMATELY 198{ COWS. { LOWER FARM}IS MADE UP OF THREE COTTAGES WITH EIGHT PEOPLE LIVING IN THEM.{HIGHER FARM}HAS FOUR HOUSES WITH SEVENTEEN PEOPLE. THE{DAIRY HERD}SPEND MOST OF THEIR TIME GRAZING IN THE GREEN FIELDS DURING THE{SPRING & SUMMER MONTHS}BUT DURING THE{WINTER MONTHS}THEY ARE HOUSED IN BRICK CUBICLES.THE THREE CUBICLES AT{LOWER FARM}HOUSE 59, 28 AND 60 COWS.{WHEAT & BARLEY CROPS}ARE GROWN FOR THE {WINTER}FEED FOR THE CATTLE. THIS YEAR A TOTAL OF 116{CALVES}WERE BORN FROM BOTH FARMS, ALSO SOME 120 ACRES OF CORN GROWN.
